DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect two different antipsychotic medication control blood sugar people risk diabetes mentally healthy .
DOC.brief_title: Examining Effects Antipsychotic Medications Insulin Sensitivity
DOC.detailed_description: Antipsychotic medication treat severe psychiatric symptom , hallucination , paranoid thought , delusion . Research show medication may put people high risk metabolic derangement , insulin resistance . Certain antipsychotic , like clozapine olanzapine , associate high risk metabolic side effect others , like aripiprazole ziprasidone . Because people schizophrenia may experience adverse side effect switch antipsychotic medication difficult find people schizophrenia experience take antipsychotic , study use people without psychiatric disorder risk diabetes place people schizophrenia . The study compare effect single dos two antipsychotic medication , olanzapine aripiprazole , insulin action population . In addition determine metabolic effect medication , study also seek demonstrate feasibility use mentally healthy people risk diabetes substitute people schizophrenia study effect . Participation study last 4 week . Participants first complete screen visit include follow : oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) , involve blood draw , consumption sugar drink , second blood draw ; review medical psychiatric history , include use medicine psychiatric medication ; measurement participant ' height weight . The second visit , schedule 2 week screen , include tracer-clamp study test participant ' body handle sugar . The tracer-clamp study conduct course one night morning require participant stay study location overnight . At 3 AM , participant receive intravenous line ( IV ) sugar solution . Just 8 AM , receive second IV opposite arm draw blood monitor blood sugar level . At 8 AM , participant begin receive insulin first IV ; blood sample draw blood sugar level monitor time ensure remain within healthy range . At 11 AM , participant receive injection antipsychotic medication arm muscle . The antipsychotic , randomly assign , either olanzapine aripiprazole . Participants monitor 3 hour receive injection antipsychotic medication ; time , blood sample draw , blood sugar level monitor ensure within healthy range , secondary medication available counteract certain side effect antipsychotic . After 2 week , participant undergo third study visit repeat OGTT .
DOC.criteria: Prediabetic , define 2hour postload serum glucose 140 199 mg/dl 75gram standard oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) within past 90 day Family history type 2 diabetes mellitus Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 35 kg/m2 English speaker Nonsmoker History Axis I mood , anxiety , psychotic disorder , confirm Structured Clinical Interview DSMIV Use psychotropic drug
